DOC.brief_title: Oxytocin Suppresses Substance Use Disorders Associated With Chronic Stress
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether intra-nasally administer oxytocin decrease crave use alcohol stress reactivity follow exposure laboratory-induced stress among Active Duty Service Members ( AD SMs ) dual diagnosis alcohol use disorder post-traumatic anxiety ( i.e. , PTSD anxiety disorder NOS ) . This 2-arm placebo control study . Subjects complete battery self-report questionnaires behavioral interview . Baseline assessment subjective ( crave , stress ) , physiologic ( HR , BP ) , neuroendocrine measure ( salivary cortisol ) collect . These assessment repeatedly collect throughout test portion study . Subjects receive acute administration intra-nasal oxytocin placebo expose laboratory-induced social stressor . They ask give short speech perform arithmetic front panel judge . Following task , additional post-task assessment subjective , physiological , neuroendocrine measure complete next hour .
